biotools.summary: A browsable, manually curated, and relational database of human histone proteins and histone modifying enzymes. It contains 55 human histone proteins, 106 distinct sites of their post-translational modifications (PTMs) and 152 histone-modifying enzymes. Entries have been grouped into 5 types of histones, 8 types of post-translational modifications and 14 types of enzymes that catalyze addition and removal of these modifications.

bioschemas.name: HIstome
